name: Suncatcher Scarab
movement: walk 30 ft., burrow 40 ft., fly 15 ft.
description: The Suncatcher Scarab is a gargantuan beetle with armored plating, possessing an imposing presence and the ability to control its environment.
memorable: Its ability to create zones of silence and double damage to structures makes it a unique threat on the battlefield.
goals: To attack fortifications and disrupt enemy coordination, maximizing its overwhelming presence.
relations: Potentially interacts with other large beasts or constructs it might encounter in its territory.
environment: Typically found in open terrains or ruined structures where it can utilize its siege abilities.
strengths: Highly resilient with damage resistance to non-magical physical attacks and various condition immunities.
weaknesses: Extremely low intelligence limits its strategic capabilities in combat.
attacks: Its bite attacks deal significant piercing and poison damage, and it can unleash devastating area effects with its burrowing burst.
most_powerful_ability: The Discordant Drone prevents enemies from communicating and casting spells, creating disarray in enemy ranks.
senses: Possesses blindsight with a range of 90 feet, allowing it to detect hidden threats nearby.
skills: Has a perception skill with a modifier of +1, providing average awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Can traverse difficult terrain without hindrance.
Can knock enemies prone with area effects.
Deals double damage to structures due to its siege ability.
Is a relentless force that cannot have its speed reduced.
Can unleash either thunder or radiant damage based on its wing position.

powerful insect capable of area control
monster with blindsight and poison attacks
scarab that can burrow and fly
